details.songOfAdoration: Angels, from the Realms of Glory #094

specialMusic.title: Yet Not I, but Through Christ in Me

list: The next quarterly business meeting is Sunday, December 1.
"Stroll through Bethlehem" is December 7 from 5:00-8:00 PM. MBC will build and man the inn.
The Ladies’ Ornament Exchange is December 9 at 6:00 PM at Ann Deaton’s house. Please bring an appetizer or dessert; soup will be provided.
